name: Autoplay Media Studio Exported Project
summary: An APZ file is a project file exported by AutoPlay Media Studio, a Windows application used to create multimedia software, such as CD/DVD menus, interactive tutorials, and simple utilities. It contains all the contents of an AutoPlay project, including the .AUTOPLAY project file, media assets (including images, videos, and .BTN buttons), scripts , and other related resources in a Zip-compressed archive format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: APZ file open in Indigo Rose Autoplay Media Studio 9
